verses.verse: I saw<WH7200> the Lord<WH136> standing<WH5324> upon the altar<WH4196>: and he said<WH559>, Strike<WH5221> the lintel of the door<WH3730>, that the posts<WH5592> may shake<WH7493>: and cut<WH1214> them in the head<WH7218>, all of them<WH2026>; and I will kill the last<WH319> of them with the sword<WH2719>: he that flees<WH5127> of them shall not flee away<WH5127>, and he that escapes<WH6412> of them shall not be delivered<WH4422>.
